clauses.GDPR_1: Personal data must be processed lawfully, fairly and transparently.
clauses.GDPR_2: Data must be collected for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes.
clauses.GDPR_3: Data collection must be limited to what is necessary for processing.
clauses.GDPR_4: Personal data must be accurate and kept up to date.
clauses.GDPR_5: Data must not be kept longer than necessary.
clauses.GDPR_6: Data must be processed securely using appropriate technical measures.

clauses.DPDP_1: Personal data can be processed only for lawful purpose.
clauses.DPDP_2: Data fiduciaries must ensure accuracy and completeness of data.
clauses.DPDP_3: Data must not be retained beyond necessary period.
clauses.DPDP_4: Data principals have right to access their personal data.
clauses.DPDP_5: Significant data fiduciaries must appoint data protection officer.

clauses.APRA_1: Banks must maintain adequate capital adequacy ratios.
clauses.APRA_2: Risk management frameworks must be comprehensive and appropriate.
clauses.APRA_3: Information security controls must protect customer data.
clauses.APRA_4: Business continuity plans must be tested regularly.

clauses.CCPA_1: Consumers have the right to know what personal data is collected.
clauses.CCPA_2: Consumers can opt-out of sale of personal data.
clauses.CCPA_3: Businesses must provide equal service to consumers who exercise privacy rights.
clauses.CCPA_4: Personal information must be adequately protected.
